A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yes\, yes\, yes! It's not a movie for the faint of heart\, since it's full of energy and lots of thrills and even seems that you cannot even blink or you'll lose something important. But I loved everything about it! The characters\, the plot (specially the twists)\, the main story and all of the alternatives\, even those who didn't seem important\, but made everything work out. Plus\, the female force is strong with this one [yay\, Feminism!]. For me\, it's one of the best Star Wars movies ever created and it translates perfectly what I think and feel about this series. I LOVED IT!!
